the perfect dose of horror and action, I've known this game since childhood but only now i started playing it, and it's very good, it's like 28 days later which i love, no slow-stupid "classic zombies", the l4d zombies are rabid and very fast, which makes for a very exciting change of pace from your usual zombie game like resident evil etc
Fun fast paced zombie killing, few short maps with interesting characters that reveal more about themselves and the 'hidden' story the further you play. Only bested by its sequel 8.4/10
